cluster_relations.rel_desc: Fear of the unknown is a core recurring theme in urban legends.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a central recurring theme or motif within the narrative or narrative category represented by the object.
cluster_relations.subject_class_label: Urban Legend Emotional Themes and Responses

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: Scope: urban legends like the "Hook Man"

cluster_relations.rel_desc: A perceived threat of danger is a core recurring theme in urban legends.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a central recurring theme or motif within the narrative or narrative category represented by the object.
cluster_relations.subject_class_label: Urban Legend Emotional Themes and Responses

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The allure of the unknown is paired with the experience of a good scare as joint emotional draws of urban legends.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that two entities are linked through narrative, emotional, or conceptual association within a thematic or story context, without asserting direct causality.
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Urban Legend Emotional Themes and Responses

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: Effect: both contribute to enduring popularity of urban legends

remarks: Relation models their joint role in audience attraction; semantics are associative rather than strictly causal.
Relation models their joint role in audience attraction; semantics are associative rather than strictly causal.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Dark pasts of haunted houses are linked to the sense of lurking dangers.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that two entities are linked through narrative, emotional, or conceptual association within a thematic or story context, without asserting direct causality.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: StoryRole: threat backstory for haunted houses

remarks: Semantics somewhat indirect; relation mainly captures that dark pasts contribute to perceived danger.
Semantics somewhat indirect; relation mainly captures that dark pasts contribute to perceived danger.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Cursed objects in stories are thematically linked to lurking dangers.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that two entities are linked through narrative, emotional, or conceptual association within a thematic or story context, without asserting direct causality.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: NarrativeFunction: example of a dangerous or ominous object

remarks: Could also be modeled as cursed objects causing danger; text only implies this via the warning context.
Could also be modeled as cursed objects causing danger; text only implies this via the warning context.
